name: Escape the Room (itch) (bhsueh123)
description:
A game all about escaping the room. Made this within a 1-week time span whenever I had time. Started on 3/20/2022

Currently, there are only 3 levels. More levels soon to come...?

Kinda has REALLY low FPS on HTML, so if you wanna download it, you can do so as well.
